typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string,
		SellStartDate as string,
		SellEndDate as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> salesoeder
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SalesCategory
salesoeder, SalesCategory join(salesoeder@ProductCategoryID == SalesCategory@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinmutipletables
salesoeder, SalesCategory join(salesoeder@ProductCategoryID == SalesCategory@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['salessalescategorytable'],
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name = salesoeder@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		ModifiedDate,
		ParentProductCategoryID,
		SalesCategoryName = SalesCategory@Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> destination
